name: Ranchan Falls
description: The Recreational park of Ranchan is located just south of Serian, about 60 km from Kuching. Easy access from the main nr 1 highway.The park is well maintained, as is generally the case in Sarawak.A good footpath leads to the falls and to a suspension bridge where you can cross to the other side of the river.The suspension bridgeNot surprisingly the park is popular with the locals. A perfect destination for a pleasant Sunday afternoon.Check if you need a permit before planning a waterfall trip. More information hereWaterfalls can be dangerous ! Always take care about your safetyVisitor Comments

imgDesc: Ranchan park, the rules and regulations
